short_summary: Construction of a self-supported tower on a remote CCG communication site
description: Work under this Contract includes the construction of a self-supported tower on a remote CCG communication site. Work is to be completed on Swindle Peak which is a site located approximately 55 kilometres North of Bella Bella, BC. Site coordinates are approximately 52° 34' 44.47"N, 128° 34' 50.37"W. This is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase process. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested respondents. The second phase (Phase Two) will invite the qualified respondents to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. Upon award of a contract in Phase Two, the qualification list resulting from the first phase will expire and will not be used in any other solicitation. Following Phase Two solicitation closing, bid results will be recorded and may be obtained by emailing/telephoning a request to the address/number indicated in the Invitation to Tender.
